sage.scene.shape

Class Quad

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.TriMesh
          • sage.scene.shape.Quad

  • public class Quad
extends TriMesh
    Quad defines a four sided, two dimensional shape (a quadrilateral) lying flat in the Z=0 plane by default. The height of the Quad defines its size along the y-axis, while the width defines its size along the x-axis. Each Quad vertex has a default normal of [0,0,1] and default texture coordinates such that (0,0) is in the lower left corner and (1,1) is in the upper right corner.
    Author:
    John Clevenger, based on a similar class in JMonkeyEngine.

    • Method Detail

      • resize

        public void resize(float width,
                   float height)
        resize changes the width and height of this Quad by altering its vertices. Does not alter any of the other underlying Quad attributes such as the current normal and texture coordinate values.
        Parameters:
        width - - the new width of the Quad
        height - - the new height of the Quad

      • updateGeometry

        public void updateGeometry(float width,
                           float height,
                           java.awt.Color color)
        Rebuilds this Quad from scratch based on a new set of parameters.
        Parameters:
        width - - the new width of the Quad
        height - - the new height of the Quad
        color - - the new color of the Quad
